document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi was forced to issue a statement backing economy minister giulio tremonti for the third time in just over a month, following fresh talk of a breakdown in relations.
document.title: berlusconi backs minister amid new signs of rift
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi was forced to issue a statement backing economy minister giulio tremonti for the third time in just over a month, following fresh talk of a breakdown in relations.
